snippet: Introducing 'news you can use' about American college admissions, for an audience in India.
abstract: Introducing 'news you can use' about American college admissions, for an audience in India.
lead_paragraph: Given the growing and passionate interest of students from India in American universities -- a recent New York Times article noted that Indians are now "the second-largest foreign student population in America, after the Chinese, with almost 105,000 students in the United States" -- The Choice is undertaking a pilot project in collaboration with a new blog aimed at readers in India.

headline.main: Some Words of Wisdom for Applicants from India
